title: Spatial Ability Development Project via Digital Game-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic spatial awareness and proficiency in using digital tools
context.additional_context: Learners engage in game-based projects using personal devices, improving spatial problem-solving skills through collaboration and self-directed learning, with continuous monitoring and feedback via formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can solve object placement and path optimization problems in 3D space with 80% accuracy using digital games.
Learners can quantitatively evaluate improvements in spatial cognition by analyzing in-game collected data.
Learners can propose solutions applying spatial reasoning skills to real-world social issues (e.g., urban design) through PBL team projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
